subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Rooney, held without a goal in a 2-1 loss to Swansea, has not scored in United’s first four Premier League games of the season, a development only magnified by the fact that he is not alone.
snippet: Rooney, held without a goal in a 2-1 loss to Swansea, has not scored in United’s first four Premier League games of the season, a development only magnified by the fact that he is not alone.
